text: N’iyo tumusogongeje ku mpuhwe ziduturutseho nyuma yo kugerwaho n’ingorane, rwose aravuga ati “Ibi mbibonye kuko mbikwiye, kandi sinkeka ko imperuka izabaho. Kandi nindamuka nsubijwe no kwa Nyagasani wanjye, mu by’ukuri nzagirayo ibyiza kurushaho.” Rwose tuzabwira ba bandi bahakanye ibyo bakoze, ndetse tunabumvisha ibihano bikomeye
